alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Polk, northeastern Grand Forks and southeastern Walsh Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Poland, or 19 miles south of Grafton, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manvel around 300 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 151 and 161. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
